means: [地名] [叙利亚] 巴尔米拉（泰德穆尔的旧称）

sentence.Network_en: To judge from the rains of Palmyra, it must once have been a beautiful city.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据它的古迹来判断, 巴尔米拉过去一定是一座美丽的城市.

sentence.Network_cn: 根据它的古迹判断, 帕尔迈拉曾是一座美丽的城市.

而巴尔米拉（Palmyra）是叙利亚沙漠上的一片绿洲，位于大马士革的东北方，是古代最重要的文化中心之一，保存了其作为大都市的 …
帕尔米拉(Palmyra)是它的希腊名字，它的阿拉伯名字叫Tadmor(泰德穆尔)。古帕尔米拉最早见于文献记载是公元前2000年，建于幼发 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Portuguese palmeira 'palm tree'. The change in the ending was due to association with the name of the ancient city of Palmyra

means.word_mean: 1. tall fan palm of Africa and India and Malaysia yielding a hard wood and sweet sap that is a source of palm wine and sugar; leaves used for thatching and weaving
